name: Fairy´s Dungeon Escape
description:
Fairy´s Dungeon Escape

Try to escape the ENDLESS DUNGEON as a fireball shooting fairy. Clear your path and defeat your enemies. 

You can post your highscore in the comments.

Miz Jam 1

This is my Submission to the "Miz Jam 1" Game Jam based off Miziziziz video series Four Game Developers Jam Off the Same Art Kit.

Controlls
  • "Space" to fly (Flappy Bird like)
  • "Enter" to shot fireballs
  • "Escape" to pause the game
Credits
  • Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack) for the Art Kit
